bibl.title: The Empire of the Tetrarchs. Imperial Pronouncements and Government, AD 284-324. (Oxford Classical Monographs.)
bibl.note: Examines the vast range of texts produced by the emperors of the tetrarchic era and their palatine officials. - Pp. 123-203: catalogue raisonné of imperial letters and edicts (including inscriptions and papyri).
bibl.seg: CORCORAN Simon, The Empire of the Tetrarchs. Imperial Pronouncements and Government, AD 284-324. (Oxford Classical Monographs.)
Oxford, Clarendon Press, 1996, 8°, xv-406 pp., 1 carte, 7 figg. ISBN 0-19-814984-0. £48.

Examines the vast range of texts produced by the emperors of the tetrarchic era and their palatine officials. - Pp. 123-203: catalogue raisonné of imperial letters and edicts (including inscriptions and papyri).
